task.title: Fix dashboard online status and delivery state transitions

events.content: Treat broker-spawned workers as online when broker reports online/pid and mark optimistic sends acked on API success: Treat broker-spawned workers as online when broker reports online/pid and mark optimistic sends acked on API success

raw.question: Treat broker-spawned workers as online when broker reports online/pid and mark optimistic sends acked on API success
raw.chosen: Treat broker-spawned workers as online when broker reports online/pid and mark optimistic sends acked on API success
raw.reasoning: Relaycast presence can lag worker process state; dashboard should reflect broker runtime truth and delivery checkmarks should advance on API ack

retrospective.summary: Patched dashboard agent online merge + message ack state, added targeted tests, and rebuilt dashboard artifacts for local broker workflow
